alluxio.master.file.meta

Class MountTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.file.meta.MountTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable

    @ThreadSafe
public final class MountTable
extends Object
implements JournalCheckpointStreamable
    This class is used for keeping track of Alluxio mount points.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MountTable.Resolution
      This class represents a UFS path after resolution.

      void add(AlluxioURI alluxioUri, AlluxioURI ufsUri, MountOptions options)
      Mounts the given UFS path at the given Alluxio path.
      void checkUnderWritableMountPoint(AlluxioURI alluxioUri)
      Checks to see if a write operation is allowed for the specified Alluxio path, by determining if it is under a readonly mount point.
      boolean delete(AlluxioURI uri)
      Unmounts the given Alluxio path.
      String getMountPoint(AlluxioURI uri)
      Returns the closest ancestor mount point the given path is nested under.
      Map<String,MountInfo> getMountTable()
      Returns a copy of the current mount table, the mount table is a map from Alluxio file system URIs to the corresponding mount point information.

      Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream.

    • Method Detail

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

        public void streamToJournalCheckpoint(JournalOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream.
        Specified by:
        streamToJournalCheckpoint in interface JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • add

        public void add(AlluxioURI alluxioUri,
                AlluxioURI ufsUri,
                MountOptions options)
         throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                InvalidPathException
        Mounts the given UFS path at the given Alluxio path. The Alluxio path should not be nested under an existing mount point.
        Parameters:
        alluxioUri - an Alluxio path URI
        ufsUri - a UFS path URI
        options - the mount options
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the mount point already exists
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered

      • delete

        public boolean delete(AlluxioURI uri)
        Unmounts the given Alluxio path. The path should match an existing mount point.
        Parameters:
        uri - an Alluxio path URI
        Returns:
        whether the operation succeeded or not

      • getMountPoint

        public String getMountPoint(AlluxioURI uri)
                     throws InvalidPathException
        Returns the closest ancestor mount point the given path is nested under.
        Parameters:
        uri - an Alluxio path URI
        Returns:
        mount point the given Alluxio path is nested under
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered

      • getMountTable

        public Map<String,MountInfo> getMountTable()
        Returns a copy of the current mount table, the mount table is a map from Alluxio file system URIs to the corresponding mount point information.
        Returns:
        a copy of the current mount table

      • isMountPoint

        public boolean isMountPoint(AlluxioURI uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - an Alluxio path URI
        Returns:
        whether the given uri is a mount point

      • resolve

        public MountTable.Resolution resolve(AlluxioURI uri)
                              throws InvalidPathException
        Resolves the given Alluxio path. If the given Alluxio path is nested under a mount point, the resolution maps the Alluxio path to the corresponding UFS path. Otherwise, the resolution is a no-op.
        Parameters:
        uri - an Alluxio path URI
        Returns:
        the MountTable.Resolution representing the UFS path
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered

      • checkUnderWritableMountPoint

        public void checkUnderWritableMountPoint(AlluxioURI alluxioUri)
                                  throws InvalidPathException,
                                         AccessControlException
        Checks to see if a write operation is allowed for the specified Alluxio path, by determining if it is under a readonly mount point.
        Parameters:
        alluxioUri - an Alluxio path URI
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if the Alluxio path is invalid
        AccessControlException - if the Alluxio path is under a readonly mount point
